 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָדִין‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==linen wrapper== (perhaps foreign word; compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sudinnu***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 490, a garment</sup>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָדִין‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְדִינָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (rare) [[Mark.15.46|Mark 15:46]] &gt; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***veil, saddle-cover*** (see [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1335</sup>), or <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Greek [and [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">σινδών</span>, compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>48</sup> [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 85</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Prov.31.24|Prov 31:24]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְדִינִים‎</span> [[Judg.14.12|Judg 14:12]]; [[Judg.14.13|Judg 14:13]];  — ***wrapper*** or rectangular piece of fine ***linen***, worn as outer, or (at night) as sole garment (compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>Judg 14, 12</sup>), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲלִפֹּת בְּגָדִים‎</span> [[Judg.14.12|Judg 14:12]]; [[Judg.14.13|Judg 14:13]], in list of women's finery [[Isa.3.23|Isa 3:23]], made and sold by the capable woman [[Prov.31.24|Prov 31:24]].
